ability: 【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, if you have 4 or more other 《ゲーム》 Character, you may choose 1 《ゲーム》 Character from your Waiting Room, place it into Stock.

【A】 This Ability can be activated up to 1 time each turn. During the turn when this card is placed on Stage from Hand, if this card's dealt Damage is cancelled, place the top card of your Deck into Waiting Room, deal Ｘ Damage to opponent. Ｘ is equal to that card's Level ＋1.（Climax is considered Level 0. Damage can be cancelled）
